about_us_desc: Joblistic is more than a platform. Our mission? We want to change the way the recruitment process takes place, making it simpler and more transparent for both employees and candidates. We aim to be a meeting place between young professionals and employers interested in filling their teams with talented and motivated people.
about_us_point_one: At Joblistic, we provide a complete platform for both employers and candidates to connect and streamline the recruiting process. Whether you're an employer looking for top talents or a candidate looking for a career opportunity, in both cases, Joblistic has the tools and resources to help you succeed.
about_us_point_two: Joblistic provides a personalized and easy-to-use interface for candidates. You can explore and apply for jobs that require entry-level experience using advanced filters. The recommendation system suggests suitable jobs based on your profile. Access is provided to reviews about companies to ensure the choice of a suitable employer.
about_us_point_three: Employers benefit from advanced functionalities on the platform. You can easily add jobs and manage your profile efficiently. The applications received for a job can be viewed and the CVs of the candidates are made available to make the best recruitment decisions.
about_us_point_four: The recruitment process is simplified and transparent on our platform. Each step in the process is laid out from the start, so both employees and candidates can easily track progress for each job. The platform provides the possibility to update the stage and status within an application.
get_in_touch: Get in touch with our team
about_our_team: Our team is here to help you with anything you need. Administrators can be contacted for any questions, issues or support via email or phone and will strive to respond as quickly as possible. If you do not need support, but still want to talk to us, you are welcome to do so.
contact_extra_info: We want to operate on a path built on trust. This can only be achieved through experienced communication and support. Have questions about any feature of the platform? Have any recommendations? Our entire team is more than open to making sure you get the best possible experience. From basic questions to feedback, we're happy to hear from you!
username_len: Username must have at least 3 characters.

password_len: Password must have at least 5 characters.

password_helper2: In order to reset the password, please start by writing your email below:

password_invalid_email: Invalid email for resetting the account. Try again!
password_success: The password was changed with success!
reset_helper: An email containing a token was sent to the email address previously filled in.
reset_helper2: Please fill in the new password below, its confirmation and the token sent by email. If the token entered is a valid one, then the password will be updated.

firstname_len: Firstname must have at least 3 characters.

cv_err: An error occurred while trying to retrieve CVs.
add_cv_err: An error occurred while trying to add a CV.
add_cv_success: The CV has been successfully saved.
multiple_cv_motivation: A detailed CV is essential for you to highlight your skills and experience clearly and convincingly. With multiple resume options, you can customize each application to the specific job requirements. This approach allows you to highlight the relevant aspects of your experience and tailor it more precisely to the requirements and organizational culture. Furthermore, by providing multiple CVs, you can explore different aspects of your career and highlight specific skills or achievements for each position, which can make a difference in the selection process and attract the attention of employers.
add_cv_option: Choose one of the two options below to add a CV:

sort_cv_date_desc: Sort the list descending by date

status_progress_can: The recruitment process for this position is ongoing. After each stage the employer will evaluate your candidacy and can determine the new stage or new status.
status_finished_can: The recruitment process for this position has been successfully completed and the employer has decided to select you to fill this position. Congratulations!
status_refused_can: Your recruitment process for this position has been stopped. Reason for refusal:
status_progress_emp: Recruitment for this position is in progress. After each stage, please evaluate the candidate and set the new stage or status.
status_finished_emp: The recruitment process for this position has been successfully completed and the candidate has been hired for this job. Congratulations!

message_recruit_delete: Are you sure you want to stop this recruitment process? It will be permanently stopped and cannot be continued. Also, if you want to stop the process, you must justify this choice in the following lines to be able to send it to the employer for transparency.
reason_in: The reason for stopping the recruitment process cannot be left blank.

apps_stop_success: The recruitment process has been successfully stopped.

create_profile_subtitle: Before you can continue with the rest of the functionalities, it is necessary to add a profile. Remember that the profile will be visible to all candidates, we recommend one as suggestive and complete as possible.

company_err: Company name must contain at least 3 characters (letters, numbers, hyphen, "&" character and spaces).
edit_account_subtitle_emp: Below you can see the information related to your account: email, company name and password. You can press the "Edit" button to change the fields, with the exception of the email address, which can no longer be updated after creating the account.
edit_account_subtitle_can: Below you can see the information related to your account: email, firstname and lastname and password. You can press the "Edit" button to change the fields, with the exception of the email address, which can no longer be updated after creating the account.
edit_account_subtitle_admin: Below you can see the information related to your account: email, username and lastname and password. You can press the "Edit" button to change the fields, with the exception of the email address, which can no longer be updated after creating the account.
stages_error: An error occurred while retrieving available stages.
job_title_error: Title must contain between 5 and 500 characters.
job_desc_error: Description must be at least 100 characters.
stages_p: This step allows specifying the stages that will be taken in the recruitment process, in order to create a transparent and easy-to-follow experience for both the employer and applicant. Important to mention is the fact that apart from the 3 implicit stages, at least one more stage must be added.
custom_stage_err: Stage must contain between 5 and 500 characters.
question_p: This step provides the opportunity to add questions for candidates. Adding questions is optional and provides an opportunity to collect additional information. This functionality facilitates the selection of suitable candidates for the available position.
question_info_desc: Add questions section first if you want.
question_err: Question must contain between 10 and 500 characters.
create_job_err: An error occurred while attempting to add the job.
message_job_delete: Are you sure you want to close the job posting? It will be permanently closed without the possibility of recovery. All recruitment processes and applications for it will be stopped.

users_retrieval_err: An error occurred while trying to retrieve the users.
users_clarifications: This page contains the following functionalities that have associated some clarifications:
users_clarifications1: Only admins can be added, the rest of the accounts are added only after the registration form. When an admin is added, a default password will be entered that must not be forgotten because it will be communicated to the new admin to be able to connect to the account. The password can be changed later.
users_clarifications2: All accounts can be deleted, but an admin account can only be deleted by the user's creator (except the main admin
users_clarifications3: Users can be filtered by role, sorted by registration date and searched by name or email.
users_clarifications4: Details about each user's account can be seen for each one through the view action.

sort_users_desc: Sort users descending by registration date

complaint_desc: We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced. If you wish to file a complaint regarding the user
complaint_desc1: please provide the relevant details below (including screenshots if applicable). After submitting your complaint, an administrator will review the information provided and take appropriate action as deemed necessary.

complain_success: The complain was added with success.
complain_in: The motivation must have at least 100 characters.
retrieve_complains_err: An error occurred while trying to retrieve the complaints.
complains_admin_info: As an administrator, you play a crucial role in handling complaints within our platform. Your responsibility involves thoroughly reviewing the motivation provided by the complainant. If clarification or additional information is required, we encourage you to speak directly with parties involved. After processing a request, please mark it as processed so that other administrators know that it has been resolved.
no_complaints_found_explanation: No complaint has been added or no complaint matches the selected criteria.
